name: Adventure Awaits (Arfi986)
description:
This game is an action-top platformer game (where we are always constantly challenged on the platform, jumping more), following a linear-based level design, following the level layout of each level provided (not like non-linear based, where the route is determined by the player), and has a generic and basic storyline, where we play as an adventurer who is always thirsty for adventure, and while looking for adrenaline-pumping challenges on the sidelines of his adventures.

Using a coin collection system as a score, and a basic opponent AI as well as additional scoring, the level design offered is also challenging and quite generic, so that it can be played by all ages.

The game will be updated in the future, and this is an early stage version.
